allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add high-value Expr and DataFrame methods

Expr methods:
- abs, round, len, n_unique
- cum_sum, cum_max, cum_min
- rank, clip, reverse

String methods:
- contains, replace, slice

DataFrame methods:
- drop_nulls, reverse

Added Polars features: abs, round_series, cum_agg, regex

68 tests passing
EOF
)")
